description: A safety film combining wacky animated scenes of children in pain with real life footage of the same thing. Careless kids are the focus and as with most other Sid Davis safety films, the examples sited usually end in tragic cumuppence. Jimmy, the star of this film, runs into a tree, steps on a rusty nail, flies a kite in a rainstorm and gets buried alive. The narrator says: "Too bad."
